itemListElement.name: Lost Watches Near Barclays Center Atlantic Avenue Brooklyn NY

lost_found_details.location_lost: Barclays Center, Atlantic Avenue, Brooklyn, NY, USA
lost_found_details.additional_information: I lost my watch while at the Salsa Festival on Saturday.  The watch was a Fossil Men's Machine Stainless Steel Chronograph Quartz Watch. Model number: FS4552
